data.title: Thane Station: Mumbai Suburban Railway Guide
data.meta_description: Join us for a journey through Thane Railway Station, where Mumbai's suburban pulse beats with history and connectivity.
data.text:
Thane Railway Station holds the distinction of being India's first passenger railway station and stands as a crucial node in the expansive network of the Mumbai Suburban Railway. Beyond its role as a mere transit point, it serves as a bustling hub facilitating the daily commute for numerous individuals, effectively linking them to their destinations and contributing significantly to the thriving economy of Thane city.

Latest News On Thane Railway Station

1. Infrastructure Upgrade:

Platform extensions: Construction work is ongoing for extending Platforms 8 and 9 to accommodate 12-car rakes for enhanced passenger capacity.

Buckle Up, Chennai! The Bengaluru-Chennai Expressway Is Ensuring More Than Just A Smooth Ride

Spanning three South Indian states, let’s see which new opportunities and transformations will this expressway bring to Chennai’s future The Bengaluru-Chennai Expressway is nearing completion with the National Highways Authority of India (NHAI) having completed over 60 per cent of the work in Tamil Nadu. This infrastructural upg...

New station entrance: A new entrance near Rani Laxmibai Chowk is under construction, offering improved access and decongestion.

Foot overbridge repairs: The foot overbridge connecting Platforms 1 and 4 is undergoing major repairs for improved safety and accessibility.

2. Train Services:

Additional local trains: The Central Railway introduced two new local train services between Thane and CSMT during peak hours, easing rush-hour congestion.

AC local train extension: Plans are underway to extend AC local train services from Kurla to Thane by mid-2024, offering a faster and more comfortable commute.

Platform announcements: Upgraded platform announcement systems with improved clarity and information accuracy are being implemented in phases.

Thane Railway Station: A Comprehensive Overview

Historical Significance: Thane Railway Station holds a special place as the first passenger railway station in India since its establishment in 1853. It's a witness to India's railway history.

Location and Importance: Situated in Thane city, Maharashtra, it's a vital junction within the Mumbai Suburban Railway network, connecting various regions.

Connectivity: The station offers frequent local trains on the Central Line to Mumbai, long-distance trains to places like Konkan Railway, Pune, Nashik, and dedicated services to Navi Mumbai on the Trans-Harbour Line.

Facilities: It has 10 platforms, ticketing offices, waiting areas, shops, food stalls, ATMs, and easy access to public transport like buses, taxis, and auto-rickshaws.

Role and Impact: Functioning as a significant transit hub, the station facilitates the movement of commuters and goods, contributing notably to Thane's economic growth and urban development by linking it to Mumbai and nearby areas.

Additional Details: It handles a huge number of trains daily, is continuously upgrading its infrastructure, and stands as an important landmark and bustling centre of activity in Thane city.

Thane Railway Station Routes

Thane railway station is a stopping point for fast trains and a central hub for local suburban trains heading both "upwards" towards CSMT and "downwards" towards Karjat & Kasara. The Harbour Line significantly contributes to its importance, as Thane acts as the starting and ending point for all Harbour Line local suburban trains. Moreover, the station plays a critical role as a major stop for long-distance express trains, including those travelling to Konkan Railway, Pune, Nashik, and various other destinations.

Ticketing Options:

Paper tickets: Purchased from counters at stations. Valid for a single journey.

Smart cards: Mumbai One Card or Yatri card offers cashless travel and recharge options. The cost is Rs 150 for the card itself, with subsequent recharges as needed.

Mobile ticketing: Through the UTS app, linked to an Aadhaar card.

Additional Points:

Fares are subject to change, so always check the latest information before purchasing tickets.

Discounts are available for senior citizens, children, students, and certain disabilities.

Platform tickets are required for accessing platforms if not holding a train ticket. The cost is Rs 10.

Resources for accurate fare information:

Platforms/apps: UTS app

Website: Mumbai Railway Vikas Corporation website (mrvc.indianrailways.gov.in)

Property Rates Around Thane Suburban Railway Station

Image Source: iStock

Property rates around Thane station vary significantly based on several factors:

1. Distance from station:

Within walking distance (0-500m): Rs 15,000 - Rs 30,000 per sq. ft. for apartments and Rs 30 lakh - Rs 1 crore for independent houses.

500m - 1km: Rs 10,000 - Rs 20,000 per sq. ft. for apartments and Rs 20 lakh - Rs 75 lakh for independent houses.

Beyond 1km: Rs 5,000 - Rs 15,000 per sq. ft. for apartments and Rs 10 lakh - Rs 30 lakh for independent houses.

2. Type of property:

Apartments generally cost more than independent houses.

Larger configurations like 3 BHK are pricier than smaller ones like 1 BHK.

3. Locality:

Areas near business hubs have higher rates.

Older localities like Naupada offer more affordable options.

4. Amenities and property age:

Newer buildings with amenities command higher prices.

Older buildings without such amenities are generally cheaper.

5. General estimates for properties near Thane station:

1 BHK apartments: Rs 50 lakh - Rs 2 crore

2 BHK apartments: Rs 75 lakh - Rs 3 crore

3 BHK apartments: Rs 1 crore - Rs 5 crore

Independent houses: Rs 25 lakh - Rs 1.5 crore
